location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘SKETCH MAP OF THE PERSIAN GULF & ARABIAN COAST’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:426 x 467 mm, on sheet 460 x 491 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Harrison & Sons Lith. St. Martins Lane, W.C.Distinctive Features:Map issued as an Annex no. 5A to Anglo-Ottoman Convention of 29 July 1913 with roads and overland and submarine telegraph lines shown. Blue line runs from Jazirat az Zakhnūnīyah to the centre of Rub' al Khali. Contains notations concerning topographic features.Bottom left hand corner below neat line: '(1000. 5/1913. 2572) F.O. 708'.Another edition of this map hold at IOR/R/15/1/741, f 8.

name.namePart: Harrison and Sons Ltd, printers, London
